columns.name: LMK_KEY
columns.rdfs:label: LMK_KEY
columns.rdfs:comment: Individual lodgement identifier. Guaranteed to be unique and can be used to identify a certificate in the downloads and the API.

columns.name: ADDRESS1
columns.rdfs:label: ADDRESS1
columns.rdfs:comment: First line of the address

columns.name: ADDRESS2
columns.rdfs:label: ADDRESS2
columns.rdfs:comment: Second line of the address

columns.name: ADDRESS3
columns.rdfs:label: ADDRESS3
columns.rdfs:comment: Third line of the address

columns.name: POSTCODE
columns.rdfs:label: POSTCODE
columns.rdfs:comment: The postcode of the property

columns.name: BUILDING_REFERENCE_NUMBER
columns.rdfs:label: BUILDING_REFERENCE_NUMBER
columns.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the property.

columns.name: CURRENT_ENERGY_RATING
columns.rdfs:label: CURRENT_ENERGY_RATING
columns.rdfs:comment: Current energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient)

columns.name: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_RATING
columns.rdfs:label: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_RATING
columns.rdfs:comment: Estimated potential energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient)

columns.name: CURRENT_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
columns.rdfs:label: CURRENT_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
columns.rdfs:comment: Based on cost of energy, i.e. energy required for space heating, water heating and lighting [in kWh/year] multiplied by fuel costs. (£/m²/year where cost is derived from kWh).

columns.name: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
columns.rdfs:label: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
columns.rdfs:comment: The potential energy efficiency rating of the property.

columns.name: PROPERTY_TYPE
columns.rdfs:label: PROPERTY_TYPE
columns.rdfs:comment: Describes the type of property such as House, Flat, Maisonette etc. This is the type differentiator for dwellings.

columns.name: BUILT_FORM
columns.rdfs:label: BUILT_FORM
columns.rdfs:comment: The building type of the Property e.g. Detached, Semi-Detached, Terrace etc. Together with the Property Type, the Build Form produces a structured description of the property

columns.name: INSPECTION_DATE
columns.rdfs:label: INSPECTION_DATE
columns.rdfs:comment: The date that the inspection was actually carried out by the energy assessor

columns.name: LOCAL_AUTHORITY
columns.rdfs:label: LOCAL_AUTHORITY
columns.rdfs:comment: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Local authority area in which the building is located.

columns.name: CONSTITUENCY
columns.rdfs:label: CONSTITUENCY
columns.rdfs:comment: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Parliamentary constituency in which the building is located.

columns.name: COUNTY
columns.rdfs:label: COUNTY
columns.rdfs:comment: County in which the building is located (where applicable)

columns.name: LODGEMENT_DATE
columns.rdfs:label: LODGEMENT_DATE
columns.rdfs:comment: Date lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register

columns.name: TRANSACTION_TYPE
columns.rdfs:label: TRANSACTION_TYPE
columns.rdfs:comment: Type of transaction that triggered EPC. For example, one of: marketed sale; non-marketed sale; new-dwelling; rental; not sale or rental; assessment for Green Deal; following Green Deal; FIT application; none of the above; RHI application; ECO assessment. Where the reason for the assessment is unknown by the energy assessor the transaction type will be recorded as 'none of the above'. Transaction types may be changed over time.

datatype.format: ECO assessment|FiT application|NO DATA!|RHI application|Stock Condition Survey|Stock condition survey|assessment for green deal|following green deal|marketed sale|new dwelling|non marketed sale|none of the above|not recorded|not recorded - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|not sale or rental|rental|rental \(private\)|rental \(private\) - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|rental \(social\)|rental \(social\) - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|unknown

columns.name: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:label: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:comment: The Environmental Impact Rating. A measure of the property's current impact on the environment in terms of carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions. The higher the rating the lower the CO₂ emissions. (CO₂ emissions in tonnes / year)

columns.name: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:label: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:comment: The potential Environmental Impact Rating. A measure of the property's potential impact on the environment in terms of carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions after improvements have been carried out. The higher the rating the lower the CO₂ emissions. (CO₂ emissions in tonnes / year)

columns.name: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:label: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:comment: Current estimated total energy consumption for the property in a 12 month period (kWh/m2). Displayed on EPC as the current primary energy use per square metre of floor area.

columns.name: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:label: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:comment: Estimated potential total energy consumption for the Property in a 12 month period. Value is Kilowatt Hours per Square Metre (kWh/m²)

columns.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:label: CO2_EMISSIONS_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:comment: CO₂ emissions per year in tonnes/year.

columns.name: CO2_EMISS_CURR_PER_FLOOR_AREA
columns.rdfs:label: CO2_EMISS_CURR_PER_FLOOR_AREA
columns.rdfs:comment: CO₂ emissions per square metre floor area per year in kg/m²

columns.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:label: CO2_EMISSIONS_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:comment: Estimated value in Tonnes per Year of the total CO₂ emissions produced by the Property in 12 month period.

columns.name: LIGHTING_COST_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:label: LIGHTING_COST_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:comment: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for lighting the property.

columns.name: LIGHTING_COST_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:label: LIGHTING_COST_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:comment: GBP. Potential estimated annual energy costs for lighting the property after improvements have been made.

columns.name: HEATING_COST_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:label: HEATING_COST_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:comment: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for heating the property.

columns.name: HEATING_COST_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:label: HEATING_COST_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:comment: GBP. Potential annual energy costs for lighting the property after improvements have been made.

columns.name: HOT_WATER_COST_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:label: HOT_WATER_COST_CURRENT
columns.rdfs:comment: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for hot water

columns.name: HOT_WATER_COST_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:label: HOT_WATER_COST_POTENTIAL
columns.rdfs:comment: GBP. Potential estimated annual energy costs for hot water after improvements have been made.

columns.name: TOTAL_FLOOR_AREA
columns.rdfs:label: TOTAL_FLOOR_AREA
columns.rdfs:comment: The total useful floor area is the total of all enclosed spaces measured to the internal face of the external walls, i.e. the gross floor area as measured in accordance with the guidance issued from time to time by the Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors or by a body replacing that institution. (m²)

columns.name: ENERGY_TARIFF
columns.rdfs:label: ENERGY_TARIFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Type of electricity tariff for the property, e.g. single.

datatype.format: 24 hour|5|INVALID!|NO DATA!|Single|Unknown|dual|dual \(24 hour\)|off-peak 10 hour|off-peak 18 hour|off-peak 7 hour|standard tariff

columns.name: MAINS_GAS_FLAG
columns.rdfs:label: MAINS_GAS_FLAG
columns.rdfs:comment: Whether mains gas is available. Yes means that there is a gas meter or a gas-burning appliance in the dwelling. A closed-off gas pipe does not count.

columns.name: FLOOR_LEVEL
columns.rdfs:label: FLOOR_LEVEL
columns.rdfs:comment: Flats and maisonettes only. Floor level relative to the lowest level of the property (0 for ground floor). If there is a basement, the basement is level 0 and the other floors are from 1 upwards

columns.name: FLAT_TOP_STOREY
columns.rdfs:label: FLAT_TOP_STOREY
columns.rdfs:comment: Whether the flat is on the top storey

columns.name: FLAT_STOREY_COUNT
columns.rdfs:label: FLAT_STOREY_COUNT
columns.rdfs:comment: The number of storeys in the apartment block.

columns.name: MAIN_HEATING_CONTROLS
columns.rdfs:label: MAIN_HEATING_CONTROLS
columns.rdfs:comment: Type of main heating controls. Includes both main heating systems if there are two.

columns.name: MULTI_GLAZE_PROPORTION
columns.rdfs:label: MULTI_GLAZE_PROPORTION
columns.rdfs:comment: The estimated banded range (e.g. 0% - 10%) of the total glazed area of the Property that is multiple glazed.

columns.name: GLAZED_TYPE
columns.rdfs:label: GLAZED_TYPE
columns.rdfs:comment: The type of glazing. From British Fenestration Rating Council or manufacturer declaration, one of; single; double; triple.

datatype.format: INVALID!|NO DATA!|double glazing installed before 2002|double glazing installed during or after 2002|double glazing, unknown install date|double, known data|not defined|secondary glazing|single glazing|triple glazing|triple, known data

columns.name: GLAZED_AREA
columns.rdfs:label: GLAZED_AREA
columns.rdfs:comment: Ranged estimate of the total glazed area of the Habitable Area.

datatype.format: Less Than Typical|More Than Typical|Much Less Than Typical|Much More Than Typical|NO DATA!|Normal|Not Defined

columns.name: EXTENSION_COUNT
columns.rdfs:label: EXTENSION_COUNT
columns.rdfs:comment: The number of extensions added to the property. Between 0 and 4.

columns.name: NUMBER_HABITABLE_ROOMS
columns.rdfs:label: NUMBER_HABITABLE_ROOMS
columns.rdfs:comment: Habitable rooms include any living room, sitting room, dining room, bedroom, study and similar; and also a non-separated conservatory. A kitchen/diner having a discrete seating area (with space for a table and four chairs) also counts as a habitable room. A non-separated conservatory adds to the habitable room count if it has an internal quality door between it and the dwelling. Excluded from the room count are any room used solely as a kitchen, utility room, bathroom, cloakroom, en-suite accommodation and similar and any hallway, stairs or landing; and also any room not having a window.

columns.name: NUMBER_HEATED_ROOMS
columns.rdfs:label: NUMBER_HEATED_ROOMS
columns.rdfs:comment: The number of heated rooms in the property if more than half of the habitable rooms are not heated.

columns.name: LOW_ENERGY_LIGHTING
columns.rdfs:label: LOW_ENERGY_LIGHTING
columns.rdfs:comment: The percentage of low energy lighting present in the property as a percentage of the total fixed lights in the property. 0% indicates that no low-energy lighting is present.

columns.name: NUMBER_OPEN_FIREPLACES
columns.rdfs:label: NUMBER_OPEN_FIREPLACES
columns.rdfs:comment: The number of Open Fireplaces in the Property. An Open Fireplace is a fireplace that still allows air to pass between the inside of the Property and the outside.

columns.name: HOTWATER_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: HOTWATER_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: HOT_WATER_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: HOT_WATER_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: HOT_WATER_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: HOT_WATER_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: FLOOR_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: FLOOR_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: FLOOR_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: FLOOR_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: FLOOR_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: FLOOR_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: WINDOWS_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: WINDOWS_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: WINDOWS_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: WINDOWS_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: WINDOWS_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: WINDOWS_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: WINDOWS. Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: WALLS_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: WALLS_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: WALLS_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: WALLS_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: WALLS_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: WALLS_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: SECONDHEAT_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: SECONDHEAT_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: SHEATING_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: SHEATING_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: SHEATING_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: SHEATING_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: ROOF_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: ROOF_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: ROOF_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: ROOF_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: ROOF_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: ROOF_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: MAINHEAT_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: MAINHEAT_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: MAINHEAT_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: MAINHEAT_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: MAINHEAT_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: MAINHEAT_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: MAINHEATCONT_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: MAINHEATCONT_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of the property feature

columns.name: MAINHEATC_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: MAINHEATC_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: MAINHEATC_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: MAINHEATC_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: LIGHTING_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:label: LIGHTING_DESCRIPTION
columns.rdfs:comment: Overall description of property feature. Total number of fixed lighting outlets and total number of low-energy fixed lighting outlets

columns.name: LIGHTING_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: LIGHTING_ENERGY_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: LIGHTING_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:label: LIGHTING_ENV_EFF
columns.rdfs:comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

columns.name: MAIN_FUEL
columns.rdfs:label: MAIN_FUEL
columns.rdfs:comment: The type of fuel used to power the central heating e.g. Gas, Electricity

datatype.format: B30D \(community\)|B30K|B30K \(not community\)|Community heating schemes: heat from boilers - biomass|Community heating schemes: heat from heat pump|Community heating schemes: waste heat from power stations|Electricity: electricity displaced from grid|Electricity: electricity, unspecified tariff|Gas: biogas|Gas: bottled LPG|Gas: bulk LPG|Gas: mains gas|INVALID!|LNG|LPG \(community\)|LPG \(not community\)|LPG - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|LPG special condition|LPG subject to Special Condition 18|NO DATA!|Oil: heating oil|Solid fuel: dual fuel appliance \(mineral and wood\)|Solid fuel: house coal|Solid fuel: manufactured smokeless fuel|Solid fuel: wood chips|Solid fuel: wood logs|Solid fuel: wood pellets \(bulk supply in bags, for main heating\)|Solid fuel: wood pellets \(in bags, for secondary heating\)|To be used only when there is no heating/hot-water system|To be used only when there is no heating/hot-water system or data is from a community network|anthracite|appliances able to use mineral oil or liquid biofuel|biodiesel from any biomass source|biodiesel from used cooking oil only|biodiesel from vegetable oil only|bioethanol|biogas \(community\)|biogas \(not community\)|biogas - landfill - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|biomass \(community\)|biomass - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|bottled LPG|bulk wood pellets|coal \(community\)|dual fuel - mineral + wood|electricity \(community\)|electricity \(not community\)|electricity - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|from heat network data \(community\)|heat from boilers that can use mineral oil or biodiesel \(community\)|heat from boilers using biodiesel from any biomass source \(community\)|house coal \(not community\)|house coal - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|mains gas \(community\)|mains gas \(not community\)|mains gas - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|oil \(community\)|oil \(not community\)|oil - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|rapeseed oil|smokeless coal|waste combustion \(community\)|waste combustion - this is for backwards compatibility only and should not be used|wood chips|wood logs|wood pellets in bags for secondary heating

columns.name: WIND_TURBINE_COUNT
columns.rdfs:label: WIND_TURBINE_COUNT
columns.rdfs:comment: Number of wind turbines; 0 if none.

columns.name: HEAT_LOSS_CORRIDOR
columns.rdfs:label: HEAT_LOSS_CORRIDOR
columns.rdfs:comment: Flats and maisonettes only. Indicates that the flat contains a corridor through which heat is lost. Heat loss corridor, one of: no corridor; heated corridor; unheated corridor

columns.name: UNHEATED_CORRIDOR_LENGTH
columns.rdfs:label: UNHEATED_CORRIDOR_LENGTH
columns.rdfs:comment: The total length of unheated corridor in the flat. Only populated if flat or maisonette contains unheated corridor. If unheated corridor, length of sheltered wall (m²).

columns.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT
columns.rdfs:label: FLOOR_HEIGHT
columns.rdfs:comment: Average height of the storey in metres.

columns.name: PHOTO_SUPPLY
columns.rdfs:label: PHOTO_SUPPLY
columns.rdfs:comment: Percentage of photovoltaic area as a percentage of total roof area. 0% indicates that a Photovoltaic Supply is not present in the property.

columns.name: SOLAR_WATER_HEATING_FLAG
columns.rdfs:label: SOLAR_WATER_HEATING_FLAG
columns.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the heating in the Property is solar powered.

columns.name: MECHANICAL_VENTILATION
columns.rdfs:label: MECHANICAL_VENTILATION
columns.rdfs:comment: Identifies the type of mechanical ventilation the property has. This is required for the RdSAP calculation.

datatype.format: NO DATA!|mechanical, extract only|mechanical, supply and extract|natural

columns.name: ADDRESS
columns.rdfs:label: ADDRESS
columns.rdfs:comment: Field containing the concatenation of address1, address2 and address3. Note that post code is recorded separately.

columns.name: LOCAL_AUTHORITY_LABEL
columns.rdfs:label: LOCAL_AUTHORITY_LABEL
columns.rdfs:comment: The name of the local authority area in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Local Authority ONS Code.

columns.name: CONSTITUENCY_LABEL
columns.rdfs:label: CONSTITUENCY_LABEL
columns.rdfs:comment: The name of the parliamentary constituency in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Constituency ONS Code.

columns.name: POSTTOWN
columns.rdfs:label: POSTTOWN
columns.rdfs:comment: The post town of the property

columns.name: LODGEMENT_DATETIME
columns.rdfs:label: LODGEMENT_DATETIME
columns.rdfs:comment: Date and time lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register.

columns.name: TENURE
columns.rdfs:label: TENURE
columns.rdfs:comment: Describes the tenure type of the property. One of: Owner-occupied; Rented (social); Rented (private).

datatype.format: NO DATA!|Not defined - use in the case of a new dwelling for which the intended tenure in not known. It is no|Owner-occupied|Rented \(private\)|Rented \(social\)|owner-occupied|rental \(private\)|rental \(social\)|unknown

columns.name: FIXED_LIGHTING_OUTLETS_COUNT
columns.rdfs:label: FIXED_LIGHTING_OUTLETS_COUNT
columns.rdfs:comment: The number of fixed lighting outlets.

columns.name: LOW_ENERGY_FIXED_LIGHT_COUNT
columns.rdfs:label: LOW_ENERGY_FIXED_LIGHT_COUNT
columns.rdfs:comment: The number of low-energy fixed lighting outlets.

columns.name: UPRN
columns.rdfs:label: UPRN
columns.rdfs:comment: The UPRN submitted by an assessor or alternatively from the department’s address matching algorithm.

columns.name: UPRN_SOURCE
columns.rdfs:label: UPRN_SOURCE
columns.rdfs:comment: Populated with the values "Energy Assessor" or "Address Matched" to show how the UPRN was populated
